<script type="text/javascript" src="https://content.jwplatform.com/libraries/hUCNX7V0.js"></script>

        <script type="text/javascript" src="//cdn-gulli.ladmedia.fr/js/compiled/videoreplay_cloud.js"></script>
    

    <link href="//ssl.p.jwpcdn.com/player/v/7.2.3/skins/six.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
    <style type="text/css">
        body {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
        }

        .bloc_player * {
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }

        .bloc_player .embed-responsive {
            display: block;
            height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            padding: 0;
            position: relative;
        }

        .bloc_player .embed-responsive.embed-responsive-16by9 {
            padding-bottom: 56.25%;
        }

        .bloc_player .embed-responsive .jwplayer {
            width: 100% !important;
            height: 100% !important;
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            top: 0;
        }

        .bloc_player .embed-responsive .embed-responsive-item,
        .bloc_player .embed-responsive iframe,
        .bloc_player .embed-responsive embed,
        .bloc_player .embed-responsive object {
            border: 0 none;
            bottom: 0;
            height: 100%;
            left: 0;
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .bloc_player .jw-skin-seven .jw-slider-horizontal .jw-slider-container {
            margin-top: 7px;
        }

        .bloc_player .jw-playlist .jw-label,
        .bloc_player .jw-playlist .jw-name {
            vertical-align: middle;
        }

        .bloc_player .jw-playlist-container {
            left: -21%;
            width: auto;
        }

        .bloc_player .jw-playlist .jw-name {
            width: 100%
        }
    </style>

<script type="text/javascript">
    xtnv = document;
    xtsd = 'http://logc279';
    xtsite = '517473';
    xtpage = 'embed_a_couper';

</script>

<body>

        <div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9">
        <div id="jwplayer_container">Chargement du player ...</div>
    </div>

<!-- eStat -->
<script>
    function jwGetPos() {
        return parseInt(jwplayer('jwplayer_container').getPosition());
    }


    
                            
    


    var Apnx = [ 10170215, 13364267, 10170218];
    if (/Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
        var Apnx = [ 13181115, 13364268, 13181116];
    }


            var playlistInfo = new Array();
        playlistInfo.push({
        nid: 'VOD68993751872000',
        cleEp: 'P10032664',
        duration: '470'
    });
        playlistInfo.push({
        nid: 'VOD68993752052000',
        cleEp: 'P10032681',
        duration: '470'
    });
        playlistInfo.push({
        nid: 'VOD68993752122000',
        cleEp: 'P10032694',
        duration: '470'
    });
        playlistInfo.push({
        nid: 'VOD68993752192000',
        cleEp: 'P10032704',
        duration: '470'
    });
        playlistInfo.push({
        nid: 'VOD68993752262000',
        cleEp: 'P10032705',
        duration: '470'
    });
        
    var mediaInfo = {
                
                        
        mediaContentId: 'P10032664', //.replace(/[^0-9]+/,""),
                        mediaDiffMode: "TVOD",
        mediaChannel: 856
    };

    var streaming = {
        diffusion: "replay",
        callbackPosition: jwGetPos,
        playerObj: jwplayer('jwplayer_container'),
        playerName: "player",
        streamName: "JT-20141106",
        streamDuration: parseInt('470')
    };


    (function () {
        // 1. Configuration of the JSON object
        var confStreamingAnalytics = {
            serial: 231031214894,
            measure: "streaming",

            mediaInfo: mediaInfo,
            streaming: streaming

        };
        // 2. Loading the measurement system
        var eS = document.createElement('script');
        eS.type = 'text/javascript';
        eS.async = true;
        eS.src = ('https:' === document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'prof.estat.com/js/mu-5.2.js';
        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        s.parentNode.insertBefore(eS, s);
        // 3. Sending the measurement
        if (eS.addEventListener) { // for all browsers except old IEs ( < 9)
            eS.addEventListener('load', function () {
                eSloaded();
            }, false)
        } else { // for old IEs only
            eS.onreadystatechange = function () {
                if (eS.readyState in {complete: 1, loaded: 1}) {
                    eSloaded();
                }
            };
        }
        eSloaded = function () {
            contentStreamTag = new eStatTag(confStreamingAnalytics);

        };
    })();
</script>
<!-- /eStat -->

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">

    var cookies = {};
    document.cookie.split('; ').forEach(function (a) { var b = a.split('='); cookies[b[0]] = b[1]; });
    var trackNPlay = true;
    if (cookies.hasOwnProperty('TC_OPTOUT') && (!(/@@@ALL/.test(cookies.TC_OPTOUT)))) {
        trackNPlay = false;
    }


    if(trackNPlay){
        (function () {
            var scriptElt1 = document.createElement("script");
            scriptElt1.id = "tc_script_1_11";
            scriptElt1.src = "http://cdn-analytics.ladmedia.fr/gulli/xtcore.js";
            scriptElt1.async = true;
            (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0].parentNode).insertBefore(scriptElt1, null);
        })();
    }


    var aTags = {};
    aTags['pre_roll'] = 131910;
    aTags['pre_roll_2'] = 131911;
    aTags['pre_roll_3'] = 135091;
    aTags['pre_roll_4'] = 185091;
    aTags['post_roll'] = 131912;

    // xtPlaylist must be a global variable
    if (typeof xtPlaylist == 'undefined') {
        var xtPlaylist = new Object();
    }

    real_richname = 'video::' + 'dessins-animes::oggy_et_les_cafards_s5::s5e45';

    var richnamePub = 'pub';
    var richnameSite = 'replay::' + real_richname;

    richnameSite = richnameSite.replace(/_s[0-9]/, "");

    xtPlaylist['jwplayer_container'] = [
        {
            type: 'video',
            xtn2: 1,
            richname: richnameSite,
            clink: '',
//            refresh: '30',
            stream: '18',
            location: 'int',
            mode: 'clip',
            size: '',
            extension: '9'
        }
    ];
    initjwplayer('jwplayer_container', aTags, richnameSite, richnamePub);

    function initjwplayer(idplayer, aTags, richnameSite, richnamePub) {
		window.getPlayList = jwplayer('jwplayer_container').getPlaylist;
    	window.getPlaylistIndex = jwplayer('jwplayer_container').getPlaylistIndex;
    	window.changePlayListIndex = jwplayer('jwplayer_container').changePlayListIndex;
    	window.playlistItem = jwplayer('jwplayer_container').playlistItem;





        var playing_video = false;
        var confGeneral = {
            controlbar: 'over',
            idlehide: true,
            primary: 'html5',
//            autostart: true,
//            stretching: 'exactfit',
            debug: 'all',
            "autostart": "false",
            modes: [
                {type: 'html5'}
            ],
            width: jQuery(document).width(),
            height: jQuery(document).height(),
            playlist: [
                                                                                                                                                                                                {
                    sources: [
                        {file: "http://gulli-hls-replay.akamaized.net/68993751872000/68993751872000_ipad.smil/playlist.m3u8"},
                        {file: "http://gulli-mp4-replay.akamaized.net/68993751872000/68993751872000_1500.mp4"}
                    ],
                    image: "http://resize1-gulli.ladmedia.fr/r/280,210,smartcrop,center-top/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images/452516_0.jpg",
                    title: "Saison 5, Episode 28 : Gare au Drakkar",
                    titleHTML: "Saison 5, Episode 28 <span>Gare au Drakkar</span>",
                    playlist_title: "Oggy et les cafards - Saison 5, Episode 28 : Gare au Drakkar",
                    playlist_titleHTML: "<p>Oggy et les cafards</p>Saison 5, Episode 28 <span>Gare au Drakkar</span>",
                    mediaid: "VOD68993751872000"
                },
                                {
                    sources: [
                        {file: "http://gulli-hls-replay.akamaized.net/68993752052000/68993752052000_ipad.smil/playlist.m3u8"},
                        {file: "http://gulli-mp4-replay.akamaized.net/68993752052000/68993752052000_1500.mp4"}
                    ],
                    image: "http://resize1-gulli.ladmedia.fr/r/280,210,smartcrop,center-top/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images/452518_0.jpg",
                    title: "Saison 5, Episode 45 : Mon empire pour une peluche",
                    titleHTML: "Saison 5, Episode 45 <span>Mon empire pour une peluche</span>",
                    playlist_title: "Oggy et les cafards - Saison 5, Episode 45 : Mon empire pour une peluche",
                    playlist_titleHTML: "<p>Oggy et les cafards</p>Saison 5, Episode 45 <span>Mon empire pour une peluche</span>",
                    mediaid: "VOD68993752052000"
                },
                                {
                    sources: [
                        {file: "http://gulli-hls-replay.akamaized.net/68993752122000/68993752122000_ipad.smil/playlist.m3u8"},
                        {file: "http://gulli-mp4-replay.akamaized.net/68993752122000/68993752122000_1500.mp4"}
                    ],
                    image: "http://resize1-gulli.ladmedia.fr/r/280,210,smartcrop,center-top/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images/custom/thumbnails/snapshot_VOD68993752122000_20180824-112357.png",
                    title: "Saison 5, Episode 58 : Le grand déménagement",
                    titleHTML: "Saison 5, Episode 58 <span>Le grand déménagement</span>",
                    playlist_title: "Oggy et les cafards - Saison 5, Episode 58 : Le grand déménagement",
                    playlist_titleHTML: "<p>Oggy et les cafards</p>Saison 5, Episode 58 <span>Le grand déménagement</span>",
                    mediaid: "VOD68993752122000"
                },
                                {
                    sources: [
                        {file: "http://gulli-hls-replay.akamaized.net/68993752192000/68993752192000_ipad.smil/playlist.m3u8"},
                        {file: "http://gulli-mp4-replay.akamaized.net/68993752192000/68993752192000_1500.mp4"}
                    ],
                    image: "http://resize-gulli.ladmedia.fr/r/280,210,smartcrop,center-top/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images/custom/thumbnails/snapshot_VOD68993752192000_20180824-164725.png",
                    title: "Saison 5, Episode 68 : Les bananes de la colère",
                    titleHTML: "Saison 5, Episode 68 <span>Les bananes de la colère</span>",
                    playlist_title: "Oggy et les cafards - Saison 5, Episode 68 : Les bananes de la colère",
                    playlist_titleHTML: "<p>Oggy et les cafards</p>Saison 5, Episode 68 <span>Les bananes de la colère</span>",
                    mediaid: "VOD68993752192000"
                },
                                {
                    sources: [
                        {file: "http://gulli-hls-replay.akamaized.net/68993752262000/68993752262000_ipad.smil/playlist.m3u8"},
                        {file: "http://gulli-mp4-replay.akamaized.net/68993752262000/68993752262000_1500.mp4"}
                    ],
                    image: "http://resize3-gulli.ladmedia.fr/r/280,210,smartcrop,center-top/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images/custom/thumbnails/snapshot_VOD68993752262000_20180824-165158.png",
                    title: "Saison 5, Episode 69 : L'enfant de la jungle",
                    titleHTML: "Saison 5, Episode 69 <span>L'enfant de la jungle</span>",
                    playlist_title: "Oggy et les cafards - Saison 5, Episode 69 : L'enfant de la jungle",
                    playlist_titleHTML: "<p>Oggy et les cafards</p>Saison 5, Episode 69 <span>L'enfant de la jungle</span>",
                    mediaid: "VOD68993752262000"
                },
                                            ],

            hlslabels: {
                "135": "very low",
                "279": "low",
                "438": "medium",
                "862": "high"
            }
                    };

        if (typeof a2dRandom === "undefined") {
            var a2dRandom = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100000);
        }
        var confSchedule = {},
                sex = {0: 'mixte', 1: 'filles', 2: 'garcons', 3: 'mixte'},
                keyword_a2d = 'oggy_et_les_cafards_s5,plus-grands,' + sex[3],
                sTags = 's[]=' + aTags['pre_roll'] + '&s[]=' + aTags['pre_roll_2'] + '&s[]=' + aTags['pre_roll_3']+ '&s[]=' + aTags['pre_roll_4'];



        var confA2D = {
            primary: 'html5',
            advertising: {
                "client": "vast",
                "vpaidmode": "insecure",
                "maxRedirects":10,
                "requestTimeout":20000,
                "admessage": "Votre vidéo dans XX secondes.",
                "cuetext": "publicité",
                "skipmessage": "passer cette video dans XX secondes",
                "forceNonLinearFullSlot": true,
                "vpaidcontrols": true,
                "schedule": {
                    "adbreak": {
                        "offset": 'pre',
                        "tag": 'https://secure.adnxs.com/vmap?id='+Apnx[0]+'&cb=[CACHEBUSTER]&kw_lp-partenaire='+keyword_a2d
                    },
                    "midroll": {
                        "offset": '50%',
                        "tag": 'https://secure.adnxs.com/vmap?id='+Apnx[1]+'&cb=[CACHEBUSTER]&kw_lp-partenaire='+keyword_a2d
                    },
                    "postroll": {
                       "offset": 'post',
                        "tag": 'https://secure.adnxs.com/vmap?id='+Apnx[2]+'&cb=[CACHEBUSTER]&kw_lp-partenaire='+keyword_a2d
                    }
                }


                            }
        };

        if(!trackNPlay){
            confA2D.advertising = null;
        }

        var confRelated = {};
        var confGA = {ga: {}};
        var confSharing = {};

       theplayer = jwplayer(idplayer).setup(
                jQuery.extend(
                        true,
                        confGeneral,
                        confA2D,
                        confRelated,
                        confGA,
                        confSharing
                )
        );

        // debug HLS
        theplayer.on('visualQuality', function (e) {
            console.log('quality', e);
        });

        theplayer.on('ready', function(e){
             xtjw_init(theplayer, xtPlaylist);
             setTimeout(function () {
                 jwplayer(idplayer).playlistItem(1);
             }, 100);

        });


        theplayer.on('adCompanions', function (event) {
            console.log('companions', event.companions);
            for (var i = 0; i < event.companions.length; i++) {
                var entry = event.companions[i],
                        resource = entry.resource;
                if (resource.match(/\.swf/i)) {
                    insertAdToBanner(entry);
                }
                else {
                    insertAdToHabillage(i, entry);
                }
            }
            playing_video = false;
        });


        theplayer.on('adComplete', function () {
            xtPlaylist[idplayer][0].richname = richnamePub;
            xtPlaylist[idplayer][0].mode = 'live';
            xtPlaylist[idplayer][0].duration = null;
            xtPlaylist[idplayer][0].refresh = '0';
            xtHitjw_v2(this, xtPlaylist, {newstate: 'idle', oldstate: 'playing'});    // stop

            // reset habillage
            var parentDocument = parent.document.getElementsByTagName('head'),
                    scriptTag;
            if (parentDocument.length) {
                scriptTag = document.createElement('script');
                scriptTag.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
                scriptTag.innerHTML = 'jQuery.la.promo.removeSkin();';
                parentDocument[0].appendChild(scriptTag);
            }

            // reset bannière
            parentDocument = parent.document.getElementById('banner_synchro');
            if (parentDocument) {
                parentDocument.innerHTML('');
            }

            playing_video = false;
        });

        theplayer.on('time', function (time) {
            // si on est en train la vidéo (et non la pub)
            // si la video a déjà commencé depuis 1 seconde
            if (playing_video === false && time.position >= 1.00 && time.position < jwplayer(idplayer).getDuration() - 5) {
                // positionnement playlist
                var scrollablePl = document.getElementsByClassName("jw-playlist");
                if (scrollablePl.length) {
                    scrollablePl[0].scrollTop = jwplayer(idplayer).getPlaylistIndex() * $('li.jw-option').height();
                }
                playing_video = true;
            }
        });

        theplayer.on('play', function (e) {
            if(trackNPlay)contentStreamTag.notifyPlayer("play");
            top.postMessage("jwplClicked", "*");
        });

        theplayer.on('pause', function (e) {
            if(trackNPlay)contentStreamTag.notifyPlayer("pause");
        });

        theplayer.on('playlistComplete', function (e) {
            if(trackNPlay)contentStreamTag.notifyPlayer("stop");
        });

        theplayer.on('playlistItem', function (index, item) {
            // on ne compte pas les 2 premiers evenements
            if (typeof window.oncePlItem == "undefined" || window.oncePlItem < 2) {
                if (typeof window.oncePlItem == "undefined") {
                    window.oncePlItem = 0;
                }
                window.oncePlItem++;
            } else {
                if(trackNPlay)contentStreamTag.notifyPlayer("stop");
            }

            var eltStreaming = streaming;
            eltStreaming.streamDuration = playlistInfo[index.index].duration;

            var eltMediaInfo = mediaInfo;
            eltMediaInfo.mediaContentId = playlistInfo[index.index].cleEp;

            contentStreamTag.set({streaming: eltStreaming, mediaInfo: eltMediaInfo});

            setTimeout(function () {
                if (window.top.changePlayListIndex) {
                    window.top.changePlayListIndex(index.index);
                }

                // Tracking :
                if(trackNPlay) {
                    if (typeof window.top.xt_med === 'function') {
                        try {
                            window.top.xt_med('F', window.top.xtn2, window.top.xtpage);
                        } catch (ignore) {
                        }
                    }
                    if (typeof window.ga === 'function') {
                        try {
                            window.ga('send', 'pageview');
                        } catch (ignore) {
                        }
                    }
                }
            }, 1000);
            playing_video = false;
        });


        theplayer.on('seeked', function (e) {
            // on ne compte pas les 1 premiers evenements
            if (typeof window.onceSeeked == "undefined" || window.onceSeeked < 1) {
                if (typeof window.onceSeeked == "undefined") {
                    window.onceSeeked = 0;
                }
                window.onceSeeked++;
                window.onceSeeked++;
            } else {
                if(trackNPlay)contentStreamTag.notifyPlayer("play", window.seekOffset);
            }
        });

        theplayer.on('seek', function (e) {
            window.seekOffset = e.offset;
            if(trackNPlay)contentStreamTag.notifyPlayer("pause", Math.round(e.position));
        });
        return false;
    }
</script>
</body>
</html>
